trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.UnhandledException" name="My.Application.UnhandledException" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.UnhandledException" name="My.Application.UnhandledException" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event occurs when an unhandled exception occurs in an application that implements the Visual Basic Application Model.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>hendelsen oppstår når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i en applikasjon som implementerer Visual Basic applikasjons-modellen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: UnhandledExceptionEventArgs contains the <xref:System.Exception> that occurred and indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: UnhandledExceptionEventArgs inneholder den <xref:System.Exception>som oppstod, og angir om programmet må avsluttes ved avslutningen unntak behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event occurs when an unhandled exception occurs in an application that implements the Visual Basic Application Model.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>hendelsen oppstår når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i en applikasjon som implementerer Visual Basic applikasjons-modellen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Exception> that occurred and indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs>inneholder den <xref:System.Exception>som oppstod, og angir om programmet må avsluttes ved avslutningen unntak behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Exception></xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om programmet må avsluttes ved avslutningen unntak behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: Angir om programmet må avsluttes ved avslutningen behandlingsprogrammet unntak.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model checks the value of this property after running the handlers of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic programmet modellen kontrollerer verdien for denne egenskapen når du har kjørt behandlingsprogrammer for den <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>hendelsen.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: If ExitApplication is `True`, then the application exits.
Otherwise, the application continues to run.
For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [oversikt over Visual Basic programmet modellen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>som angir om programmet må avsluttes ved avslutningen unntak behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.Boolean>
